H0.text: Chemical is the form into which electrical energy changes when Trevor turns on a lamp.

H1.text: Light is the form of energy that electrical energy changes into when Trevor turns on a lamp and the lamp is on.

H2.text: Mechanical is the form of energy that electrical energy changes into when Trevor turns on the lamp and the lamp is on.

H3.text: Potential is the form of energy that electrical energy changes into when Trevor turns on a lamp.

A4.text: Electric light produces light from electricity.

A5.text: The remaining 95% is lost as heat.
